feed.title: The Data Place
feed.subtitle: A better model for data publishing.

entry.title: Open For Business
entry.content: Today we’re officially launching The Data Place. You can read a more detailed post here. We’re also delighted to announce that we’re now part of G-Cloud 9 on the UK Government’s Digital Marketplace.
entry.summary: Today we’re officially launching The Data Place. You can read a more detailed post here. We’re also delighted to announce that we’re now part of G-Cloud 9 on the UK Government’s Digital Marketplace.
